name: Bionic Momentum
description:
Compelling single-player adventure
    Play as a young man gifted with a bionic suit that turns him into a fast and deadly weapon.

    Embark on an immersive journey and discover many atmospheric worlds as you battle your way past enemies and obstacles.

    Stand alone against an encroaching darkness, wielding your bionic suit, to save the world from the clutches of an insidious entity hell-bent on controlling the very fabric of the universe.

    No one stands a chance except you...

Fast-paced action with emphasis on speed & momentum


    Harness your lightning-fast reflexes and unleash a thrilling, high-octane experience, with intricately polished movement controls.

    Master the art of movement with tight jump timings and precise controls, while retaining high velocity — enabling you to leap over vast canyons and huge lakes with grace and precision.

    Maintain an unyielding momentum, as even the smallest loss in speed could jeopardize your chances of conquering formidable leaps and boundless obstacles.

Challenging levels, hard bosses and many unique abilities!


    Immerse yourself in over 50+ meticulously designed levels that progressively test your mettle.

    Prepare to push the limits of your skills, as you confront increasingly challenging trials that demand nothing less than your utmost determination.

    As you progress through the levels, you will unlock a range of unique abilities that will aid you on your arduous journey.

    But fair warning — this game grows ever more demanding as you approach its climactic finale.

    Do you have what it takes to finish the game..?
